Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI only gives broad and often incorrect feedback. Can be useful to point out things you may want to re-evaluate but is not overall very trustworthy

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers can sometimes refuse to give good feedback to students, either directing them to texts or just saying to watch the lecture. At least AI has to give an answer.
